ygData.msgSnippet: i dont know what s going to happen with the decipticons yet. they have no offical leader and have not landed yet. ... untouched for ... functioning. ... tiny

i 'dont know what's going to happen with the decipticons yet. they 
have no offical leader and have not landed yet.
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Deep within the bowls of Cybertron, a crypt of Decepticons lay 
untouched for 
> many years. Silent... dark... all there were by no means 
functioning. 
> 
> Yet in the darkness, 2 glowing eyes appeared as they moved like 2 
tiny ghosts 
> through the darkness of the crypt. They approached the center, the 
heart of 
> the crypt, a soft glowing light in rememberance of those brave 
Decepticons 
> who ceased to function in battle.
> 
> As the 2 glowing lights soon enough revealed they belonged to a 
form that did 
> function!
> 
> A beast machine, in the form of an Earth white bengal tiger stood 
in the 
> light, basking in it's soft glow. The optics of this regal creature 
glanced 
> about as it seemed to realize where it was, & understand the 
nightmare it was 
> in. The optics soon enough looked at it's current form.. to it's 
horror! 
> 
> RrrAAARRRRRRRROOOWWWWWLLLLLLLLUUUNNNGGHHHHHHAAAAAAA!!!!! as the 
blood curling 
> cry went out, echoing throughout the crypt.
> 
> The creature found it extremely hard to transform, unable to at 
this time. 
> What was once familiar to her, was no more. This new form was by no 
means 
> welcome.
> 
> She walked over between the statues of Thundercracker & Skywarp, 
her friends &
>  fellow comrades during the Great War. As she laid down at their 
feet, they 
> were now large than her, she hated this already. A soft howl, moan 
& whimper 
> came from her. Emotions? This was unusual. She was a Decepticon, 
not some.. 
> organic creature. But she was not totally organic. This confused 
her more.
> 
> In a broken, uneasy deep feminine feline. "What... is.. happening.. 
to .. 
> me?!" she growled as she laid at the feet of the Decepticon statues.
